description:
Cool comfort for hot garden parties and offices with weak air conditioning. Shirt dresses are a beautiful thing on sunny summer days, gently gliding against your skin to keep the air flowing. The Frivol uses a wicking, ultralight material that makes the heat a lot more enjoyable.

  • Lightweight recycled poly’ blend wicks moisture and feels airy against the skin
  • 2-way stretch keeps comfort levels high when on the move
  • Flat pleat just below the open neck adds a little structure to this dress’s drape
  • Dual hand pockets use technical construction to lay as flat as can be
  • Laser cut ventilation at the center back to help keep you cool
  • UPF50+ stops more than 98% of harsh UV in its tracks
name: Indyeva Frivol Dress - Women's
